column4: can anyone tell me how i can install sun java on my ubuntu 10.04

printenv
wats that??
open a terminal and type "printenv"
ok

oh, I see
what do you want to do, check for environment variables, or edit the registry, or something else?

for a batch script?

afaik no, I don't think you have to do anything
